content: With the Tiger Tally equipped, you will get the following buff: Upon successful hits with light attack combo, moderately increases attack for a short duration. This is a specialized effect, requiring a trigger to activate, but the damage buff is decent, and most of the time you will be landing a full light attack combo in a fight anyway.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Tally.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Tally'.
The content is as follows:
With the Tiger Tally equipped, you will get the following buff: Upon successful hits with light attack combo, moderately increases attack for a short duration. This is a specialized effect, requiring a trigger to activate, but the damage buff is decent, and most of the time you will be landing a full light attack combo in a fight anyway.
